1.title: Welcome to Fridgeport

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: A young bottle of Mustard, finds himself off the shelf to wake up in the exciting world of Fridgeport. We meet and follow the characters through their stories and adventures as Mustard adapts to the electric and diverse world of the house hold refrigerator.
imdb.title: Fridgeport
plot: The day to day adventures of a young Mustard Bottle in the world of the house hold refrigerator.::Creators

A young bottle of Mustard, finds himself off the shelf to wake up in the exciting world of _Fridgeport_ (qv). We meet and follow the characters through their stories and adventures as Mustard adapts to the electric and diverse world of the house hold refrigerator.::E. Manning
